items.sentence: Tom seemed surprised when I told him Mary wasn\'t here.
I owed Tom some money for some things he bought for me.
Tom died three days before he was to receive the award.
There\'s someone I have to get in touch with in Boston.
Today\'s paper says that another typhoon is on its way.
Tom usually doesn\'t have to work on Monday afternoons.
If I remember correctly, Tom\'s birthday is in October.
Tom says I don\'t need to go there if I don\'t want to.
Tom says he can\'t remember his French teacher\'s name.
I knew I shouldn\'t have done it, but I did it anyways.
